title: 1. Thesis
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points.

1 point

Has acceptable thesis.

Student response earns all of the following points.

1 point

Has acceptable thesis.

title: 2. Document Interpretation
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Addresses all of the documents and demonstrates understanding of all or all but one.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points.

1 point

Addresses all of the documents and demonstrates understanding of all or all but one.

Student response earns all of the following points.

1 point

Addresses all of the documents and demonstrates understanding of all or all but one.

title: 3. Document Evidence
stimulusHtml:
2 points

For 2 points:

Supports thesis with appropriate evidence from all or all but one document.

For 1 point:

Supports thesis with appropriate evidence from all but two documents.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points.

2 points

For 2 points:

Supports thesis with appropriate evidence from all or all but one document.

For 1 point:

Supports thesis with appropriate evidence from all but two documents.

Student response earns one of the following points.

2 points

For 1 point:

Student response earns all of the following points.

2 points

Supports thesis with appropriate evidence from all or all but one document.

For 1 point:

Supports thesis with appropriate evidence from all but two documents.

title: 4. Point of View Analysis
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Analyzes point of view in at least two documents.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points.

1 point

Analyzes point of view in at least two documents.

Student response earns all of the following points.

1 point

Analyzes point of view in at least two documents.

title: 5. Document Analysis
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Analyzes documents by grouping them in two or three ways, depending on the question.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points.

1 point

Analyzes documents by grouping them in two or three ways, depending on the question.

Student response earns all of the following points.

1 point

Analyzes documents by grouping them in two or three ways, depending on the question.

title: 6. Additional Documents
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Identifies and explains the need for one type of appropriate additional document or source.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points.

1 point

Identifies and explains the need for one type of appropriate additional document or source.

Student response earns all of the following points.

1 point

Identifies and explains the need for one type of appropriate additional document or source.

title: Extended Core (0-2 points)
stimulusHtml:
Expands beyond basic core of 1-7 points. A student must earn 7 points in the basic core area before earning points in the expanded core area.

Examples:

• Has a clear, analytical, and comprehensive thesis.

• Shows careful and insightful analysis of the documents.

• Uses documents persuasively as evidence.

• Analyzes point of view in most or all documents.

• Analyzes the documents in additional ways— groupings, comparisons, syntheses.

• Brings in relevant “outside” historical content.

• Explains why additional types of document(s) or sources are needed.
